body:
## What changed
- Added new Anchor program `ddns_rep`
  - `init_rep_config`
  - `deposit_rep_bond` / `withdraw_rep_bond`
  - `award_rep` (bond-gated, daily cap, diversity minimums, cooldown, duplicate-root guard)
  - `slash_rep_bond` (MVP authority path)
- Added account models:
  - `RepConfig` PDA `["rep_config"]`
  - `MinerBond` PDA `["rep_bond", miner]`
  - `MinerRep` PDA `["miner_rep", miner]`
- Added program wiring:
  - `solana/Cargo.toml` workspace member
  - `solana/Anchor.toml` devnet/localnet IDs
- Added test file `solana/tests/ddns_rep.ts`

## Anti-sybil guards implemented
- bond requirement (`min_bond_lamports`)
- daily REP cap per miner
- diversity minimums (`min_unique_name_hashes`, `min_unique_colos`)
- cooldown between awards
- duplicate receipts root rejection

## Verification
- `cd solana && cargo metadata --no-deps` ✅
- `cd solana && anchor build --program-name ddns_rep` ✅
- `cd solana && cargo test -p ddns_rep` ✅

Note: `anchor test --skip-build --skip-deploy tests/ddns_rep.ts` is not meaningful in this repo without deploying all referenced programs to local validator first; targeted Rust/program checks are passing.

commits.messageHeadline: solana: add ddns_rep program with bond-gated capped reputation accrual

title: solana: ddns_rep (bonded REP rewards with daily caps and diversity gates)
